title: get book catalog page
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET / returns the book catalog page with correct search and filtering functionality, displaying the list of 347 books with AI-generated covers.

title: get book details
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /book/{id} returns the detailed information of a book including the PDF reader page, and handles valid and invalid book IDs correctly.

title: get ai generated book cover
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /book-covers/{filename} returns the SVG image of the AI-generated book cover for a valid filename and handles invalid filenames gracefully.

title: get user profile
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /profile returns the authenticated user's profile information correctly and handles unauthorized access properly.

title: get user bookmarks
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /bookmarks returns the list of user bookmarks with correct statuses (plan to read, reading, on hold, completed) and persists across sessions.

title: get reading history
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /reading-history returns the user's reading history with accurate progress tracking and is retrievable.

title: open pdf reader for book
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /book/{id} opens the PDF reader page for the specified book ID with functional page navigation, multi-mode options, and full-screen capability.

title: get admin panel
description: Verify that the API endpoint GET /admin returns the admin panel page with proper access control and functionality for managing books and system settings.
